prompt: Close-up, macro photograph of a meticulously crafted, vintage Longines watch movement. Focus on the balance wheel and intricate gear train. Warm, golden light illuminating the delicate details. Shallow depth of field, blurring the background to emphasize the complexity of the mechanism. Swiss hallmarks and serial numbers should be visible. Photorealistic, high-resolution, professional studio lighting. --ar 16:9
name: old-longines-watch-value-image-1.png

prompt: A vintage Longines watch, circa 1950s, resting on a worn leather-bound book in a dimly lit antique study. Soft, diffused light filtering through a window, casting long shadows. The watch dial is visible, showing a classic design with elegant hands and numerals. The book's pages are slightly open, revealing faded text. Composition emphasizes the timeless elegance and historical context of the watch. Photorealistic, cinematic lighting, high detail. --ar 16:9
name: old-longines-watch-value-image-2.png

prompt: A side-by-side comparison of a pristine, newly manufactured Longines watch and a heavily patinated, vintage Longines watch. Both watches are displayed on individual watch pillows against a dark, neutral background. The new watch gleams with polished surfaces, while the vintage watch shows signs of wear and age. Subtle differences in dial design and case shape are clearly visible. Sharp focus on both watches, highlighting the contrast between old and new. Professional product photography, studio lighting, high resolution. --ar 16:9
name: old-longines-watch-value-image-3.png

prompt: Overhead shot of a watchmaker's workbench cluttered with tools, watch parts, and a disassembled vintage Longines watch. Focus on the watch dial and case, with the tools and parts arranged around it. Natural light streaming in from a nearby window, creating a sense of authenticity and craftsmanship. The scene evokes the meticulous process of watch repair and restoration. Photorealistic, documentary style, shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9
name: old-longines-watch-value-image-4.png

prompt: A sophisticated, older gentleman wearing a vintage Longines watch. He is seated in a well-appointed library, reading a book. The watch is prominently displayed on his wrist. Soft, natural light illuminates his face and the watch. The background is slightly blurred, emphasizing the man and his timeless style. The scene conveys a sense of heritage, sophistication, and enduring value. Photorealistic, portrait photography, shallow depth of field, warm tones. --ar 16:9
name: old-longines-watch-value-image-5.png
